com.milk.uberchat.gui
Class IdentitiesPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JScrollPane
                          |
                          +--com.milk.uberchat.gui.IdentitiesPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, ContainsTree, EntityListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable, SystemListener
public class IdentitiesPanel
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
implements ContainsTree, SystemListener, EntityListener

This is a panel which keeps track of all the active identities. When an identity is selected, that fact is transmitted to the MainPanel which this panel is contained within.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
Serialized Form

panelClosing

private void panelClosing()
This is called via a WindowListener when the window that this panel is in is getting closed. It makes the panel stop getting chat-based events.
